quests.name: Capture the Sun
objectives:
Find the best spot for a game of Capture the Sun.
  ‧ Take a selfie with Joy at each location.
  ‧ - The southern edge of the Meadow.
  ‧ - Near the Wishing Well in the Plaza.
  ‧ - The inside of the Dream Castle.
Report back to Joy.

Recruit players for the game of Capture the Sun.
  ‧ Merlin.
  ‧ Donald Duck.
  ‧ Goofy.
  ‧ Vanellope.
Return to Joy.

Gather materials for the Flag Poles.
  ‧ 5 Yellow Daisies
  ‧ 10 Softwood
  ‧ 1 Topaz.
Craft 5 Flag Poles.
Bring the Flag Poles to Joy.
Dress up in at least one yellow item of clothing.
Enter the Dream Castle.
Take a picture of everyone together before the game!
Talk to Joy to begin playing Capture the Sun.
Grab three Floating Suns and bring them to your own Flag Pole.
You won! Meet Joy in the Dream Castle for your prize.
Talk to Joy inside the Dream Castle to receive your prize.
Open your prize! You deserve it.
That prize seems odd... Check in with Joy.
rewards: Miniature Glowing Sun (From mailbox after quest)

quests.name: Mood Swings
objectives:
Check in on the Capture the Sun players.
  ‧ Merlin.
  ‧ Vanellope.
  ‧ Donald Duck.
  ‧ Goofy.
Talk to Joy.
Meet Donald inside his House.
Talk to Donald inside his House.

Break some of Donald's furniture with your Pickaxe.
  ‧ Couch.
  ‧ Table.
  ‧ Bookcase.
Talk to Donald.
Visit the Dreamlight Library.

Help Merlin out by cleaning the Dreamlight Library.
  ‧ Clean up the 3 Spiderwebs around the Dreamlight Library.
  ‧ Put the Four Nondescript Potion Bottles back on the shelves.
Talk to Merlin.
Talk to Vanellope.
Cook a Joyful Meal for Vanellope.
Bring Vanellope the Joyful Meal.
Talk to Goofy.

Gather the materials to craft a Shiny New Fishing Rod for Goofy.
  ‧ 10 Softwood.
  ‧ 4 Fiber.
  ‧ 2 Iron Ingot.
  ‧ Tinkering Parts.
Craft the Shiny New Fishing Rod for Goofy.
Make sure you have the Shiny New Fishing Rod in your Inventory.
Bring the Shiny New Fishing Rod to Goofy.
Fish for an interesting fish in the large pond in the Peaceful Meadow.
You found Plush Bear Thread! Bring it to Merlin for consultation.
Talk to Joy about the Plush Bear Thread.

quests.name: Imagination Land
objectives: Follow Joy to the Forgotten Lands.
Visit the Fairy Godmother's House.
Find the Forgotten Lands Biome Plans in the Fairy Godmother's House.
Make sure you have the Forgotten Lands Biome Plans in your Inventory.
Bring the Forgotten Lands Biome Plans to Joy.

Remove some Green Fires and Night Thorns from the Forgotten Lands.
  ‧ 5 Green Fires.
  ‧ 7 Night Thorns.
Talk to Joy.

Gather materials to craft the Imagination Land Arch.
  ‧ 3 Topaz.
  ‧ 10 Dark Wood.
  ‧ 2 Yellow Nasturtium.
Craft the Imagination Land Arch.
Make sure you have the Imagination Land Arch in your Inventory.
Give the Imagination Land Arch to Joy.

Gather materials to craft Sunflower and Daisy Pots.
  ‧ 10 Sunflowers
  ‧ 20 Yellow Daisies
Craft 10 Flower Pots.
Craft 10 Sunflower Pots and Daisy Pots.
Talk to Joy.
Meet up with Joy in the Forgotten Lands.
Place the Imagination Land Arch in the Forgotten Lands.
Decorate the Forgotten Lands with the 10 Sunflower and Daisy Pots.
Celebrate the brand-new Forgotten Lands!
Talk to Joy.

Remove the Night Thorns from the Forgotten Lands once more.
  ‧ 7 Night Thorns.
Brown Plush Bear Yarn was underneath the Night Thorns! Pick them up.
Talk to Merlin.
Talk to Joy.

quests.name: Dream a Little Dream
objectives: Talk to Sadness.
Return to the Inside Out Realm.

Find the materials for the Dream Production.
  ‧ Dream Camera.
  ‧ Pot of Green Paint.
  ‧ Dream Documentation.
  ‧ Spotlights.
Make sure you have the Dream Documentation in your Inventory.
Bring the Dream Documentation to Belle.
Talk to Joy.

Gather materials for the Camera Lens Filter.
  ‧ Topaz.
  ‧ Amethyst.
  ‧ Emerald.
  ‧ Garnet.
  ‧ Ruby.
  ‧ Sapphire.
  ‧ Tourmaline.
Craft the Camera Lens Filter.
Go to the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights.

Place the filming equipment in the secret chamber.
  ‧ Dream Camera.
  ‧ Pot of Green Paint.
  ‧ Spotlight 1.
  ‧ Spotlight 2.
Talk to Joy.
Place the Camera Lens Filter on the Dream Camera.
Talk to Sadness about the emotions of the Dream Production.
Talk to The Forgotten.
Return to the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights to film a Dream Production.
Talk to The Forgotten on the movie set.
Talk to Joy.
Clean up the 6 glasses.
Craft three new Light Bulbs.
Make sure you have the three Light Bulbs in your Inventory.
Give Joy the Light Bulbs inside the secret chamber.

Find the right mood for the start of the scene by changing the lighting.
  ‧ Try a joyful, yellow mood.
Listen to the performance.

Find the right mood for the middle of the scene by changing the lighting.
  ‧ Try a sad, blue mood.
Listen to the performance.

Find the right mood for the end of the scene by changing the lighting.
  ‧ Try a angry, purple mood.
Listen to the performance.
Some Yellow Plush Bear Yarn appeared! Pick them up.
Talk to Joy.

quests.name: Emotional Rescue
objectives: Pick up the memory that fell out of the Realm door.
Talk to Merlin.

That memory could use some joy.
  ‧ Cook any dish that makes you happy.
The memory is looking more... joyful? But there's still something missing.
Take a picture of a Night Thorn in the Valley.
The memory looks complete! Time to set in in place.
Return to the Inside Out Realm door in the Castle.
Place the restored memory in the Inside Out Realm door.
Enter the Inside Out Realm.
Talk to Joy.

Search the Realm for parts then reinstall them in the console.
  ‧ Some parts might have to be crafted.
Talk to Joy.
Follow Joy.
Use the big red routing control buttons to align the flippers horizontally.
Use the routing controls back near the entrance to align the flippers.
Talk to Joy.

Search the Realm for Mind Worker safety gear.
  ‧ Find a Mind Worker Helmet.
  ‧ Find Mind Worker Gloves.

Put on your Mind Worker safety gear.
  ‧ Find a Mind Worker Helmet.
  ‧ Find Mind Worker Gloves.
Use the elevator in the middle of Headquarters to head down to Long Term Memory.

quests.name: Dream On!
objectives: alk to Joy.
Follow Joy.
Enter Joy's Dream Productions space.
Talk to Joy.
Decorate the stage with classy, gold-trimmed furniture from the Dream Productions platform
Return to Joy's Dream Productions space.

Dress up in Elegant clothing.
  ‧ Select 3 Elegant clothing from your wardrobe.
Return to Joy's Dream Productions space.
Sit down at the piano to begin the dream.
A day has passed! Time to check in with Joy.
Return to Dreamlight Valley.
Place the Remote Headquarters in the Valley.
Unlock the Remote Headquarters in the Valley.
Welcome Joy to the Valley.
Talk to Joy.

Gather colorful materials for the light stick.
  ‧ Topaz.
  ‧ Apple.
  ‧ Seaweed.
  ‧ Blue Falling Penstemon.
  ‧ Carrot.
  ‧ Onyx.
Bring the colorful materials to Joy.

quests.name: Leaving The Woods Behind
objectives: Get the Burned Logs from Kristoff's old campfire in the Forest of Valor.
Grind the Burned Logs into Ashes at a Crafting Station.
Boil the Ashes at any Cooking Station to extract Lye.
Bring the Lye to Kristoff.
Talk to Maui.

Gather the Soap ingredients for Kristoff:
  ‧ 20 Carrot
  ‧ 12 Coconut
Show Kristoff the Coconuts.
Craft the Carrot Soap.
Bring the Carrot Soap to Kristoff.

quests.name: Frozen Memories
objectives: Talk to Elsa

Gather the Ingredients for the spell:
  ‧ 6 Aquamarine
  ‧ 3 Swamp Water
Bring the ingredients to Elsa
Talk to Anna to get a lock of her hair.

Make sure you have Anna's Hair in your Inventory
  ‧ Anna's Hair
Bring Anna's Hair back to Elsa.
Place the Magic Ice Block somewhere in the Village.
Sculpt the Magic Ice Block using your Pickaxe.
Talk to Kristoff.

quests.name: Village Project: A Mountain Man's Stall
objectives: Talk to Goofy.

Gather the materials for a Stall:
  ‧ 50 Softwood
  ‧ 50 Stone
  ‧ 35 Hardwood
  ‧ 10 Iron Ingot
Return to Kristoff.
Craft Kristoff's Stall.
Place Kristoff's Stall anywhere you like in the Valley.
Talk to Kristoff.

quests.name: A Broken Sled
objectives: Follow Kristoff to his Sled.
Free Kristoff's Sled from the ice.
Retrieve the Sled.
Show Kristoff his broken Sled.
Get the book called "Ice-cident: How to Fix Your Sled" from the library in Kristoff's House.

Gather the materials for the repairs:
  ‧ 50 Fiber
  ‧ 30 Hardwood
  ‧ 10 Iron Ingot
  ‧ 9 Tinkering Parts
Repair the Sled at a Crafting Station.
Get the Sled and bring it back to Kristoff.
Bring the Sled back to Kristoff.

Get a sample of the following materials for Kristoff:
  ‧ Fiber
  ‧ Brick
  ‧ Glass
  ‧ Iron Ingot
Bring the samples of the refined materials to Kristoff.

quests.name: Kristoff: A Romantic in the Making
objectives: Drop or place 20 Flowers all around Arendelle Castle and water them. (20)
Cook 10 meals with Cocoa for Anna. (10)
Make sure you have the 10 meals with Cocoa in your Inventory. (10)
Bring the meals you cooked with Cocoa to Kristoff.
Return to Daisy.

quests.name: Lost in the Dark Grove
objectives: There's a strange sound coming from the Forest of Valor. Go see what it's all about.
It's Kristoff! Talk to him.
Go through the Dark Portal.
Investigate the Dark Grove for clues about Donald Duck's whereabouts.
Show Kristoff what you found.
Ask Merlin for help to track down Donald Duck.

Gather the Ingredients for the tracking spell:
  ‧ 1 Donald's Feather
  ‧ 1 Vile Herb
  ‧ 2 Emerald
  ‧ 4 Dream Shard
Bring the Ingredients for the tracking spell to Merlin.
Return to the Dark Grove with the Enchanted Feather.
Follow the Enchanted Feather through the Dark Grove.
Talk to Donald Duck.
Place the Orb of Courage in the Forest Pillar.
Unlock Donald Duck.
Talk to Donald Duck.

quests.name: At Your Service
objectives: Go to Chez Remy with Lumiere.
Talk to Remy with Lumiere.

Find items for Lumiere in the Beauty and the Beast Realm:
  ‧ 1 French Bread in the backroom.
  ‧ 3 French Spices in the garden.
  ‧ 3 French Recipe Books in the library.
Return to Chez Remy with the French items.
Talk to Remy.

Clean up Chez Remy.
  ‧ Remove all 6 broken dishes.
Meet Tiana and Lumiere inside Tiana's Palace.
Tiana and Lumiere seem to be preparing something...
Talk to Lumiere in the kitchen of Tiana's Palace.

Gather materials for the romantic evening at Tiana's Palace:
  ‧ 40 Stone.
  ‧ 25 Softwood.
  ‧ 6 Green Rising Penstemon.
  ‧ 3 Purple Hydrangea.

Make sure to have all Ingredients for the French desserts:
  ‧ 3 Milk.
  ‧ 2 Egg.
  ‧ 1 Sugarcane.
  ‧ 1 Vanilla.
  ‧ 1 Butter.
  ‧ 1 Wheat.
  ‧ 1 Cheese.
  ‧ 3 Any Fruit.
Cook some French Desserts for Tiana
Crepe.
Pastry Cream and Fruits.
Soufflé.
Craft the Romantic Arch.
Place the Romantic Arch in front of Tiana's Palace.
Return to Tiana's Palace.
Talk to Lumiere in the dining room in Tiana's Palace.

Clean up Tiana's Palace:
  ‧ Remove the 6 broken dishes.
  ‧ Pick up the 3 floating cutlery.
  ‧ Catch all the 3 flying items.
Bring all the haunted items to Lumiere.

quests.name: Here, There, and Everywhere
objectives:
Talk to Villagers about Tiana's Palace.
  ‧ Minnie Mouse.
  ‧ The Beast.

Investigate alongside Lumiere:
  ‧ Look for 5 ghostly clues in both Remy's and Tiana's restaurants.
  ‧ Return to Lumiere with the clues you found.
Talk to Jack Skellington.

Find the spell materials for Jack Skellington.
  ‧ 1 Pumpkin Soup.
  ‧ 2 Shiny Ruby.
  ‧ 2 Shiny Sapphire.
  ‧ 10 Night Shard.
  ‧ 10 Purified Night Shard.
Return to Tiana's Palace with the materials.
Bring the spell materials to Jack Skellington inside Tiana's Palace.
Put on the Masquerade Mask to see more of the Here and There.

A Here and There Spirit was here...
  ‧ Investigate and remove the 5 Here and There tracks in Tiana's Palace.

Clear the Here and There burrow in Tiana's kitchen.
  ‧ Make sure to wear the Masquerade Mask.

Something escaped the Here and There burrow!
  ‧ Follow the spirit trail outside of Tiana's Palace.
The Here and There Spirit is now loose in the Village! Return to Lumiere.

quests.name: Spirit Hunters
objectives: Meet the investigation crew in Beast's Castle.
Talk to Lumiere along with Belle, Tiana, and Cogsworth in the Beast's Castle.

Cogsworth felt an unnatural cold breeze in the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Meet Cogsworth in the Mystical Cave.
  ‧ Talk to Cogsworth.

Cogsworth felt an unnatural cold breeze in the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Put on the Masquerade Mask to search for clues.
  ‧ Follow paw tracks to find the clue.
  ‧ Return to Cogsworth with the Frozen Red Passion Lily.

Tiana saw strange blue lights within the Vitalys Mines on the Sunlit Plateau.
  ‧ Meet Tiana in the Vitalys Mines.

Tiana saw strange blue lights within the Vitalys Mines on the Sunlit Plateau.
  ‧ Put on the Masquerade Mask to search for clues.
  ‧ Follow paw tracks to find the clue.
  ‧ Return to Tiana with the Frozen Thorn.

Belle caught a glimpse of the Here and There Spirit inside Elsa's Ice Cavern.
  ‧ Put on the Masquerade Mask to search for clues.
  ‧ Investigate the Ice Cavern for one more clue.

Make sure you have all the clues in your Inventory:
  ‧ Frozen Book.
  ‧ Frozen Red Passion Lily.
  ‧ Frozen Thorn.
Talk to Lumiere about the clues you found.

Investigate the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights.
  ‧ (Optional) Follow more (3) tracks using the Masquerade Mask.

You found the Here and There Spirit's den!
  ‧ Pick up the Clay Paw Print.
Clear the 3 Here and There thorns in the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights.

Dark Symbols have appeared in the secret chamber.
  ‧ Talk to Lumiere.
Find the Book of Symbols in the Dark Castle's first-floor library.
Bring the Book of Symbols to Belle.

Gather the necessary materials for the Binding Spell:
  ‧ 12 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 18 Here and There Debris.
  ‧ 1 Clay Paw Print.
  ‧ 20 Stone.
  ‧ 3 Crystal.
Return to the Frosted Heights' secret chamber with the spell materials.
Bring the spell materials to Belle in the secret chamber.

The Binding Spell is ready:
  ‧ Use the 3 crystals to rotate and match the Symbols on the floor.

Is the Here and There Spirit a... fox?
  ‧ Talk to Lumiere.

quests.name: Long Lost Loves
objectives: Visit the Here and There Fox in the secret chamber.
Talk to Lumiere and the Here and There Fox.
Pick up the Memory given by the Here and There Fox.
Talk to Lumiere.

Feed some critters:
  ‧ A raccoon.
  ‧ A fox.

Did feeding critters work?
  ‧ Use the Fox's previous Memory to find and search the next Memory location.
Talk to Lumiere.
Bring Villagers their favorite gifts

Another Memory from the Fox must have appeared...
  ‧ Use the previous Memory to find and search the next Memory location.
Talk to Lumiere.

Find a way to return to the Dark Grove.
  ‧ Talk to Merlin.

Gather the materials needed to craft the Fox and Raccoon Sculpture:
  ‧ Lumiere's Flame from Lumiere.
  ‧ 12 Clay.
  ‧ 12 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 2 Red Rose from the Beast's Greenhouse.
Craft the Fox and Raccoon Sculpture.

Find more Dark Symbols in the Forest of Valor to re-open the portal.
  ‧ Find the Dark Symbols in the Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Place the Fox and Raccoon Sculpture near the Dark Symbols.
Enter the Dark Portal in the Forest of Valor.

Find the Here and There Raccoon in the Dark Grove.
  ‧ Follow the guiding light!

The Here and There Raccoon looks strange...
  ‧ Talk to Lumiere.
Give the Clay Paw Print to the Here and There Raccoon.

The Here and There Raccoon seems to remember the fox again!
  ‧ Follow Lumiere and the Raccoon to the Dark Grove's exit.
Exit the Dark Grove with Lumiere and meet near the Dark Portal.
Talk to Lumiere.

The Here and There critters are reunited!
  ‧ Take a picture of the reunion with all your friends.
Talk to Lumiere.

quests.name: The Haunting of Beast's Castle
objectives: Return to the Beauty and the Beast Realm.
The castle feels unwelcoming. Go find a servant to learn what's going on.
Search the hidden passage for the Fireplace Fuel Ingredients.

Gather the following Ingredients:
  ‧ 3 Castle Canola.
  ‧ 1 Castle Paper.
  ‧ 1 Castle Softwood.
Cook the Fireplace Fuel.

Bring the Fireplace Fuel to Lumiere.
  ‧ Fireplace Fuel.
  ‧ Castle Softwood.
  ‧ Castle Paper.
The Fireplace Fuel is ready! Bring it to Lumiere.
Talk to Lumiere.
Catch the Flying Painting.

Find a place to display the Flying Painting.
  ‧ Check the walls near the piano, by the grand staircase.
Hang the painting on the wall.

Pick up the objects that appeared::
  ‧ Enigmatic Box.
  ‧ Domestic Manual Page 1.
Go tell Lumiere about what you found.
Go visit the garden to do some cleanup.
Check in with Lumiere.

Investigate the sound coming from the garden.
  ‧ Destroy statues and other obstacles to reach the garden's center.
Talk to Cogsworth.
Talk to Lumiere.

quests.name: Belle, Book, and Candle
objectives: Talk to Lumiere.
Return the Globe to the library.
Return the Lion Statue to its place upstairs.
Return the Standing Candelabra to its place near the stairs.

Collect:
  ‧ Domestic Manual Page 3.
  ‧ Second Enigmatic Key.
Show Lumiere what you found. (He should be waiting back near the grand staircase.)
Search for the old book in the West Wing.
Return to the grand staircase and show Lumiere the Damaged Domestic Manual.
Leave the Realm and talk to The Beast in his home.
Go to a Crafting Station and use the glue on the Damaged Domestic Manual and its pages.
Show the Repaired Domestic Manual to Lumiere.
Put the Repaired Domestic Manual on display.

Pick up:
  ‧ Third Enigmatic Key.
Ask Lumiere about the key.

Pick Up:
  ‧ The Bag.
  ‧ The Invitation.
Check in with Lumiere

quests.name: The Corvid Companion
objectives:
Gather Ingredients to cook a Chimera Skewer.
  ‧ Hippocampus.
  ‧ Flying Fish.
  ‧ Trumpet Snail.
  ‧ Brussels Sprout.
  ‧ Stygian Mudskipper.
Cook a Chimera Skewer for Maleficent's Raven.
Talk to The Lorekeeper.
Solve the new floor puzzle to unlock the portal to the Unwritten Realms.
Enter the Unwritten Realms.
Find a Magic Quill to ask about Maleficent's Raven.

Explore the Unwritten Realms to find the three keys.
  ‧ Buried in the Ground.
  ‧ Behind some Inkies.
  ‧ Near some filing cabinets.
Find the room with three locks and use the keys you found.
Claim the Drawbridge Lever from the chest.
Lower the drawbridge near the Waiting Room by using the Drawbridge Lever.

Maleficent's raven is locked up in a cage!
  ‧ Lower the suspended cage and find a key to unlock the cage door.
Make sure you have the Chimera Skewer in your Inventory.
Bring the Chimera Skewer to Maleficent's Raven.
Talk to Maleficent.

Gather resources to craft a Luxury Corvid Perch.
  ‧ 15 Petrified Wood.
  ‧ 10 Marble.
  ‧ 15 Mud.
  ‧ 5 Sea Monster Tooth.
Craft the Luxury Corvid Perch.
Place the Luxury Corvid Perch in Everafter close to Maleficent's Castle.
Talk to Maleficent.

quests.name: Rekindling the Fire
objectives: Remove 10 Hades' Greek columns from around Maleficent's Castle in Everafter.
Talk to Maleficent.
Visit the largest pond near the Teapot Falls.

There's no orb, but there is a... feather?!
  ‧ Dig up the White Feather.

Show the White Feather to these Villagers to figure out who it belongs to.
  ‧ Donald.
  ‧ Daisy.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck.
Find the buried orb near the end of one of the curved staircases in the Bind.
Collect Maleficent's Orb from where Scrooge McDuck buried it.
Bring Maleficent's Orb back to her.
Bring the Bag of Gems to Flynn.
Follow Flynn to see his "art."
Enter the Trial area to see Flynn's "art."
Listen to Hades and Flynn argue about Flynn's "art."
Take a picture of Flynn's "art."
Clean up 5 Flynn's "art."
Talk to Hades and Flynn.
Go inside Hades' House to see what Maleficent is plotting.
Talk to Maleficent and Hades.
Leave Hades' House.
Talk to Maleficent.

quests.name: Collateral Damage
objectives: Open your mailbox and read the mail from Remy.
Go to Remy's House.

This place is a disaster zone!
  ‧ Extinguish the 6 blue and green flames to rescue Remy.
Talk to Remy in his House.
Talk to The Lorekeeper.

Gather what you need to prepare gifts for Hades and Maleficent.
  ‧ Fish Cereberus's Chew Toy out of a pond in Mount Olympus.
  ‧ Gather Ingredients for some Feather Balm.
  ‧ - Olive.
  ‧ - Cape Gooseberry.
  ‧ - Trumpet Snail.
  ‧ - Green Beans.
  ‧ - Extra Salty Salt Crystal.
Cook up some Feather Balm for Maleficent's raven.
Bring Cereberus's Chew Toy from "Maleficent" to Hades.
Bring the Feather Balm from "Hades" to Maleficent.
Meet Maleficent and Hades in your House.
Talk to Maleficent and Hades.
Leave your House.
Ask Merida for advice in getting Hades and Maleficent to speak to each other.

Gather resources to craft a Bonfire Pit.
  ‧ 3 Gold Ingots.
  ‧ 10 Marble.
  ‧ 50 Stone.
  ‧ 15 Coal.
Craft a Bonfire Pit.
Go into Maleficent's castle to show her the Bonfire Pit.

Hades is here too! Why are they on speaking terms now?!
  ‧ Spy on Maleficent and Hades discussion.
Make sure you have the Bonfire Pit in your Inventory.
Talk to Maleficent and Hades.
Place the Bonfire Pit in the Bind.
Gather Hades and Maleficent around the Bonfire Pit.
Talk to The Lorekeeper.

quests.name: The Two Flames United
objectives: Open your mailbox and read the mail from Scrooge McDuck.
Find Scrooge McDuck in his shop.
Go to Scrooge McDuck's Store.
Listen to Scrooge McDuck argue with the Magic Quill.
Talk to Magic Quill and Scrooge McDuck.
Visit Chez Remy.
Talk to the Magic Quill and Remy.

Gather Ingredients for the Grecian Baked Fish.
  ‧ Stygian Mudskipper.
  ‧ Elysian Grain.
  ‧ Olives.
  ‧ Ambrosia.
  ‧ Salt Crystal.
Cook the Grecian Baked Fish.
Make sure you have the Grecian Baked Fish in your Inventory.
Bring the Grecian Baked Fish to the Magic Quill.

The Quills are also hassling Goofy?!
  ‧ Better visit Goofy's House.
Talk to Goofy and the Magic Quill.
Take a glamourous picture of the Quill bureaucrat.
Talk to the Magic Quill.
Talk to The Lorekeeper.
Place the Dreamlight Bell Beacon in the Library of Lore to play the Call to Adventure.
Gather your friends with the Call to Adventure.
Enter the open portal to the Unwritten Realms.

The evil Quills are blocking the way!
  ‧ Talk to Aurora.
Confront the Quills blocking the way - with all the Villagers backing you.
Go find Hades and Maleficent in the Unwritten Realms.
Confront Hades and Maleficent.
Extinguish the 3 whirling flames with your Royal Watering Can while Hades and Maleficent are distracted.
Enter the portal that Hades and Maleficent were guarding.

The Heart of Stories contains a... typewriter?
  ‧ Try writing something on it.
Return to the Vale.
Ask the Lorekeeper about what you found in the Heart of Stories.
Talk to Hades.
Talk to Maleficent.

quests.name: The Mistress of All Evil
objectives: Explore the Beanstalk Marshes around Maleficent's castle.

Explore Everafter and complete the three Fairy Tale Trials to reach Maleficent's castle.
  ‧ The Wolf of the Wilds.
  ‧ Teapot Falls.
  ‧ Knights of the Round Table.
Enter Maleficent's Catle.
Talk to Maleficent inside her castle.
Find Maleficent's missing Spinning Wheel and Throne in her castle, then place them back in the main room.

Place all of Maleficent's furniture back where it belongs.
  ‧ Maleficent's Throne.
  ‧ Maleficent's Candelabra.
  ‧ Maleficent's Fire.
  ‧ Maleficent's Spinning Wheel.
Pass through the portal to Maleficent's throne room.
Catch 1 Maleficent's Pets.
Catch 3 Maleficent's Pets.
Talk to Maleficent.

quests.name: The Unwritten Realms: Maleficent's Gift
objectives: Explore the waiting room of the Unwritten Realms.
Talk to Maleficent.
Talk to the Magic Quill in the waiting room of the Unwritten Realms.

You've been issued a number and told to wait for service.
  ‧ Wait five billion years for your number to be called.
  ‧ Or talk to Maleficent and find another solution.
Search for all of the 3 pieces of Maleficent's Ticket in the waiting room.
Change the numbers on the "Now Serving..." board to match Maleficent's ticket.

Now serving: #9375!
  ‧ Bring Maleficent's Ticket to the Magic Quill.
  ‧ Make sure you have Maleficent's Ticket in your Inventory.
Talk to the Magic Quill on the Review Floor.
Hit the wheel near the Quill with your Royal Net.
Venture through the portal into the Processing Room to find Maleficent's First Anchor Moment.
Solve the puzzles to find Maleficent's First Anchor Moment.
Make sure you have Maleficent's First Anchor Moment in your Inventory.
Bring Maleficent's First Anchor Moment back to her in the waiting room.

spoilers.title: Puzzle solution
spoilers.objective:
Row 1: Skull, Griffion, Skull.
Row 2: Griffion, Skull, Griffion.
Row 3: Skull, Griffion, Griffion.

quests.name: The Unwritten Realms: The Spinning Wheel
objectives: Venture to the second review floor and speak to the Magic Quill there.

Talk to the Magic Quill on the second floor and convince him that you're a supervisor.
  ‧ (Search around for the answers you need!)
Pick up the Conveyor Belt Wheel on the second floor of the Unwritten Realms.
Figure out how to unblock the conveyor by spinning the wheels with your Royal Net.
Venture inside Processing Room B to find Maleficent's Second Anchor Moment.
Solve the puzzles to find Maleficent's Second Anchor Moment in Processing Room B.
Make sure you have Maleficent's Second Anchor Moment in your Inventory.
Bring Maleficent her Second Anchor Moment.

quests.name: The Unwritten Realms: Maleficent's Demise
objectives: Hit the wheel with your Royal Net to summon the final portal.

spoilers.title: Pillar of Unity
spoilers.objective:
The symbols around the Pillar of Unity match the other pillars.

Using furniture mode, move the restored pillars so they are placed on their respective color & symbol. There are seven in total which must be moved and placed.

Starting from the position closest to the raft and moving clockwise, the Pillar order is as follows:

1. Pillar of Friendship (Peaceful Meadow)
2. Pillar of Trust (Glade of Trust)

spoilers.title: Finding the Secret Door
spoilers.objective: To find the Secret Door   ‧ go inside the Dream Castle, head immediately right and behind the plants beside the bottom of the stairs. There is a large purple curtain, and you'll be prompted to remove it to reveal the door at that stage of the quest.

spoilers.title: Conspicuous Items
spoilers.objective: After completing the quest there are some items which can be collected from chests inside the secret room. On the floor there is a Conspicuous Book which can be picked up. Place it inside the Conspicuous Bookcase to open yet another secret room   ‧ with some valuable gems and items and a crafting station inside.

objectives: Investigate the coin in your Inventory.

Investigate the areas revealed by the Memory for clues.
Bring Scrooge McDuck what you found.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.

spoilers.title: Location 1
spoilers.objective: In the Glade of Trust near the northern lake. Dig out a sparkling ground.

spoilers.title: Location 2
spoilers.objective: In Merlin's House, on the floor, in front of his desk.

spoilers.title: Location 3
spoilers.objective: On Dazzle Beach near the entrance of the Forest of Valor. Dig out a sparkling ground.

quests.name: The Treasure Hunt Part 2
objectives: Collect the map from Scrooge McDuck.
Bring the map to Merlin.
Focus your magic on the map in your Inventory.
The map turned into a Memory. Discover what secrets it holds.
Ask Scrooge McDuck about the Lenses of Shadows.
Put on the Lenses of Shadows to search for the treasure.

Find all the pieces of the hidden treasure:
  ‧ 1 Chest
  ‧ 2 Key pieces
Go back to Scrooge McDuck with what you found.
Gather Gold Ingots
Bring the key and the chest to Scrooge McDuck

quests.name: Village Project: Gear Loose and Fancy Free
objectives:
Scrooge McDuck has some more tips for you on the economy of Eternity Isle.
  ‧ Talk to him.

Upgrade your Hourglass to level 1 to be able to find and craft more treasures.
  ‧ Build any Ancient Machine at a Timebending Table.
  ‧ Place any Ancient Machine in the Glittering Dunes.
Return to Scrooge McDuck

quests.name: Making Cents of Things
objectives: Find Goofy in the Meadow.
Help Goofy get back in business.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.
Earn Star Coins to repair Scrooge McDuck's Store. (1K)
Use the sign outside Scrooge McDuck's store to repair it.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.
Buy something from Scrooge McDuck's Store.
You did it! Go see what Scrooge McDuck thinks.

Put on the Scrooge's Store promotional T-shirt.

Gather 12 Softwood around the Village.
Return to Scrooge McDuck.
Craft the 4 sign for Scrooge's Store using a Crafting Station.
Place 4 Scrooge's Store signs around the Village.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.

Gather the following items:

Craft Dandelion and Rising Penstemon Pot using the items collected.
Place the Dandelion and Rising Penstemon Pot near Scrooge's Store.
Return to Scrooge McDuck.

objectives:

Talk to Scrooge.

quests.name: Rebuild the Valley: Forgotten Lands

quests.name: The Haunting of Dreamlight Valley
objectives: Ach! You hear a frustrated cry from Scrooge McDuck. Go check on him.
Search for the specter in the Dream Castle.
Talk to the "specter."

quests.name: A Garden in the Desert
objectives:
Scrooge McDuck has some tips for you about Eternity Isle's economy.
  ‧ Talk to him.

Unlock Goofy's Stalls in:
  ‧ The Wild Tangle.
  ‧ The Glittering Dunes.

Plant and harvest a garden in the Glittering Dunes:
  ‧ 6 Celery.
  ‧ 6 Broccoli.
  ‧ 6 Cabbage.
Return to Scrooge McDuck.

quests.name: New Ventures (and Adventures)
objectives: Make sure you have the Condemned Building Sign in your Inventory.
Give the  Condemned Building Sign to Scrooge McDuck.
Follow Scrooge McDuck.

Gather the following from around Ancient's Landing:
  ‧ Mine 25 Copper from rocks.
  ‧ Dig up 24 Pearls from the ground.
  ‧ Mine 15 Quartz from rocks.
Bring the materials to Scrooge.
Unlock Scrooge's Store in Ancient's Landing by interacting with the Scrooge McDuck Sign beside it.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.

quests.name: Hakuna Matata
objectives: Put together a Casual outfit
Return to Simba

Add some relaxing Furniture to the Peaceful Meadow.
  ‧ 3 Seating
  ‧ 5 Landscaping
Return to Simba.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.
Order the pool from Scrooge's Store for 9000 Star Coins.

Or trade it by gathering the following:
  ‧ 2 Shiny Aquamarine
  ‧ 2 Shiny Peridot
  ‧ 3 Topaz
  ‧ 5 Peridot
  ‧ 5 Garnet
Place the Relaxing Oasis in the Meadow.
Return to Simba..

quests.name: The Great Gathering
objectives: Talk to Remy.
Figure out the last Ingredient for the cake. It asks for Eggs, Milk, Fruit, Wheat, and... something sweet?

Cook the Meals for Simba's gathering:
  ‧ Aurora's Cake (Wheat, Egg, Milk, Any Fruit, Sugarcane)
  ‧ Large Seafood Platter. (4 Seafood, Lemon)
Bring the Meals to Simba

Invite the following Villagers to Simba's gathering:
  ‧ Goofy.
  ‧ Minnie.
  ‧ Maui.
Return to Simba
Place the "No Worries" Banquet.
Throw Simba's great gathering.
Return to Simba.
Listen to Simba apologize to Nala.
Talk to Simba.
Plant and grow 9 Carrots in the Meadow
Feed 5 animals around the Valley
Talk to Nala.
Return to Simba..

quests.name: Seed of Memories
objectives: Talk to Scar.
Search the Sunlit Plateau's Mines for a hidden entrance.
Interact with the strange rocks.
Investigate the objects in the room:
The drawing on the wall.
The table full of tubes and beakers.
Talk to Merlin about what you saw.

Gather the following materials:
  ‧ 3 Dream Shard
  ‧ 3 Night Shard
  ‧ 6 Blueberry
  ‧ 3 Orange Marsh Milkweed
  ‧ 2 Empty Vial

Craft the following potions:
  ‧ Potion of Growth
  ‧ Potion of Dust
Place the Potions in the empty spaces on the Table in the Herbalist Room.
Get the Dreamlight Tree Seed from the Alchemist's Table in the Herbalist Room
Return to Simba
Follow Simba
Plant the Dreamlight Tree Seed near the pond on the Sunlit Plateau
Water the Dreamlight Tree Seed (Can be done with Miracle Elixir to speed the growth)
Listen to Simba and Scar's conversation.
Talk to Simba

quests.name: The Dreamlight Grove
objectives: Harvest some Dreamlight Fruit for Simba.
Give a Dreamlight Fruit to Simba.

  ‧ 1 Empty Vial
Craft the Dreamlight Tree Fertilizer.
Use the Dreamlight Tree Fertilizer in your Inventory.
Return to Simba

  ‧ 5 in the Frosted Heights.
  ‧ 5 in the Glade of Trust.
Return to Simba.
Follow Simba to the Dreamlight Tree.
Talk to Simba
Listen to Simba and Nala
Talk to Simba.
rewards: Three more Dreamlight Fruit trees grow in the Valley

quests.name: Stars to Guide Us
objectives: Talk to Simba in The Lion King Realm.
Follow Simba deeper into the jungle.
Talk to Simba.
Return to Dreamlight Valley and talk to Merlin.

Craft Rafiki's Walking Stick.
Return to The Lion King Realm.
Make sure you have Rafiki's Walking Stick in your Inventory.
Bring Rafiki's Walking Stick to Simba in The Lion King Realm.
Place Rafiki's Walking Stick on the stone mound.
Return to Simba.
Follow Simba to the dried-out oasis.
Talk to Simba..

Gather the following seeds:
  ‧ 3 Jungle Fern Seed
  ‧ 3 Waterfall Plant Seeds
  ‧ 3 Clearing Tree Seeds
Go back to the dried-out oasis to meet Simba.
Talk to Simba...

Plant the seeds around the oasis:

  ‧ 3 Waterfall Plant Seeds
  ‧ 3 Clearing Tree Seeds
Talk to Simba....
Use your Pickaxe to free the water source.
Talk to Simba.....
Return to Dreamlight Valley.
Welcome Simba to Dreamlight Valley.
Talk to Simba. . .

quests.name: Finding Old Friends
objectives: Visit The Lion King Realm.
Find Timon in The Lion King Realm.

In The Lion King Realm, gather:
  ‧ 4Jungle Stones.
  ‧ 4 Jungle Wood.
  ‧ 4 Red Jungle Leaves.

Make sure you have the jungle materials in your Inventory.
  ‧ 4 Jungle Stones.
  ‧ 4 Jungle Wood.
Give the jungle building materials to Timon.
Craft your own mane in The Lion King Realm using Red Jungle Leaves.
Dress up in your Red Jungle Mane.
Speak with Timon.
Follow Timon and Pumbaa into the jungle.
Listen to Timon and Pumbaa.
Speak with Timon in the jungle camp.
Craft an Empty Vial.
Search for a crown poking out of the water in The Lion King Realm and fish it out.

Make sure you have the Forgotten Crown and the Empty Vial in your Inventory.
  ‧ Lost Crown
  ‧ Empty Vial
Bring the Forgotten Crown and the Empty Vial to Timon.
Break the Lost Crown with your Royal Pickaxe.
Talk to Timon.
Follow Timon to the jungle river.
Speak with Timon.
Put the Bottle of Worries in the The Lion King Realm's river.
Go back to Timon and Pumbaa's jungle camp.
Talk with Timon.

Prepare some leafy beds with your Shovel:
  ‧ Timon's bed.
  ‧ Pumbaa's bed.
  ‧ Your bed.
Say goodnight to Timon and Pumbaa.
Lie down on your leafy bed in The Lion King Realm.
Listen to Timon and Pumbaa talk.

quests.name: Handle with Care
objectives: Follow Snow White to the entrance of the Ranch.
Progress in the "Ghost Town" quest to unlock the bridge.

Gather resources to repair the Careblossom Topiary.
  ‧ 12 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 8 Rusty Hinges.
  ‧ 10 Pebbles.
  ‧ 2 Pyrite.

Interact with the Careblossom Topiary to repair it.
  ‧ You'll need 12 Dry Wood, 8 Rusty Hinges, 10 Pebbles, and 2 Pyrite.
Talk to Snow White.

Gather resources to build your Blooming Rock Gardens.
  ‧ 5 Pink Crocus.
  ‧ 4 Purple Crocus.
  ‧ 2 Yellow Crocus.
  ‧ 15 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
Craft 4 Blooming Rock Gardens.
Place the Blooming Rock Gardens around the Careblossom Topiary.
Talk to Snow White.
Dress your horse with Snow White's Saddle
Take a picture of your horse in Snow White's Saddle.
Talk to Snow White.

Care for your horse to summon sparks.
  ‧ In a single day, feed your horse its three favorite daily meals, brush it, and pet it.
Check on the Careblossom Topiary near the entrance to the Wishblossom Ranch.

quests.name: Making Peace
objectives: Make sure you have Snow White's pie in your Inventory.
Bring the pie to Cruella.
Talk to Snow White.

Gather materials to make the Horse Plushie Friend.
  ‧ 3 Black Silk Flower.
  ‧ 10 Sequin Strands.
  ‧ 3 Measuring-Tape Snail.
Craft a Horse Plushie Friend for Cruella.
Place the Horse Plushie Friend near Cruella De Vil's House.
Talk to Cruella.
Talk to Snow White.

Gather Ingredients to cook Natural Cloak Dye.
  ‧ Beetroot.
  ‧ Scarlet Kale.
  ‧ Pincushion Peach.
Cook the Natural Cloak Dye for Snow White.
Make sure you have the Natural Cloak Dye in your Inventory.
Bring the Natural Cloak Dye to Snow White.
Make sure you have the Fairly Fashionable Cloak in your Inventory.
Bring the Fairly Fashionable Cloak to Cruella.
Check in with Snow White.

Gather materials to repair the Destroyed Fairly Fashionable Cloak.
  ‧ 5 Pearly Barley.
  ‧ 5 Button Mushroom.
  ‧ 20 Pixie Dust.
Repair the Destroyed Fairly Fashionable Cloak.
Dress up with the Fairly Fashionable Cloak to cheer up Snow White.
Talk to Snow White.
Check on the Careblossom Topiary at the entrance to Wishblossom Ranch.

quests.name: The Copycat
objectives: Visit Cruella De Vil's House.
Talk to Cruella in her house.
Exit Cruella De Vil's House.
Talk to Snow White about the meeting at Cruella's House.
Talk to Olaf about Cruella's plans.
Gather Wire Coat Hangers by fishing outside of ripples in Glamour Gulch
Bring the Wire Coat Hangers to Olaf.
Talk to WALL-E about Cruella's plans.
Mine for Antique Clothes Irons in Glamour Gulch (or grab them from your storage!)
Bring the Antique Clothes Irons to WALL-E.
Talk to Snow White about what you learned of Cruella's plans.
Talk to Snow White inside Cruella De Vil's House.
Take a picture of one of the mannequins wearing the copycat cloaks in Cruella's House.
Leave Cruella De Vil's House.
Confront Cruella about her copycat cloak production.
Talk to Snow White about the Copycat Horse Blankets.
Dress up your Wishblossom Horse with the Copycat Horse Blanket.
Talk to Cruella.

Your act of kindness for Snow White has made something happen!
  ‧ Check on the Careblossom Topiary at the entrance to Wishblossom Ranch.

quests.name: The Wishblossom Fair
objectives:
Bring Wishblossom Fair invitations to competition judges:
  ‧ Tiana.
  ‧ Daisy.
  ‧ Mulan.
Talk to Snow White.

Decorate the Ranch grounds with:
  ‧ 3 Wishblossom Fair Table.
  ‧ 8 Alpine Lampposts.
Dress up in red, blue, or white clothing.
Talk to Snow White.

Complete all activities at the Wishblossom Fair:
  ‧ The Cooking Competition.
  ‧ The Horse Beauty Contest.
  ‧ The Riding Demonstration.
Talk to Snow White.
Return to the Careblossom Topiary at the entrance to Wishblossom Ranch.

All of the Careblossoms are dead? Again?!
  ‧ Talk to Snow White.
Only one Villager could have done this... Talk to Cruella.
Talk to Tinker Bell about the ruined Careblossom Topiary.
Water the Careblossom Topiary.
Place the Wishblossom Fair Trophy close to the restored Careblossom Topiary.
Take a picture with the Wishblossom Fair guests.
Talk to Snow White.

quests.name: Hold Your Horses: The Wishing Alps
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft the Wishing Alps Stable Repair Kit:
  ‧ 10 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
  ‧ 10 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 5 Yellow Crocus.
  ‧ 2 Shiny Pyrite.
Craft the Wishing Alps Stable Repair Kit.
Use the sign beside the Stables to unlock a new stall with the Wishing Alps Stable Repair Kit.

quests.name: Hold Your Horses: Glamour Gulch
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft the Glamour Gulch Stable Repair Kit:
  ‧ 20 Sequin Strands.
  ‧ 20 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 10 Green Silk Flower.
  ‧ 4 Shiny Jasper.
Craft the Glamour Gulch Stable Repair Kit.
Use the sign beside the Stables to unlock a new stall with the Glamour Gulch Stable Repair Kit.

quests.name: Hold Your Horses: Pixie Acres
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft the Pixie Acres Stable Repair Kit:
  ‧ 30 Copter Seeds.
  ‧ 30 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 15 Yellow Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ 6 Shiny Honeycomb Stone.
Craft the Pixie Acres Stable Repair Kit.
Use the sign beside the Stables to unlock a new stall with the Stable Repair Kit.

quests.name: A Wishful Invitation
objectives:
Your mailbox is suddenly overloaded with spam!
  ‧ Open your mailbox and claim the message FREE VACATION TO WISHBLOSSOM RANCH!!! when you're ready to begin your next adventure.

A free vacation? Seems too good to be true, but you do deserve some rest. The letter mentioned a place named the Stardust Port.
  ‧ Complete "The Port of Many Worlds" quest.

A free vacation seems too good to be true...
  ‧ Use the gate in the Dream Castle to access the Stardust Port.
All aboard! Take the Train in the Stardust Port to Wishblossom Ranch.

Wishblossom Ranch is a mess! But since you're already here...
  ‧ Make sure your Wishblossom Ranch Voucher is ready in your Inventory.
Find someone to redeem your Wishblossom Ranch Voucher.

Search the area for something to help you get past the swarm of bees.
  ‧ Maybe there's something in that cave nearby...
Investigate the strange flower inside the cave up the path outside Wishblossom Ranch.

A horse?! It really seems to like you.
  ‧ Approach it and ride it.

Explore the surrounding by the Wishblossom Ranch's entrance and take the Wishblossom Horse for a ride:
  ‧ Hold to gallop.
  ‧ Approach obstacles while galloping to jump over them.
Return to Snow White.

Use the Wishblossom Horse's Push ability to move the flower cart closer to the bees.
  ‧ (Move behind the flower cart and push against it from behind on your horse.)
Talk to Snow White.
Search around the 'Wishing Well near Snow White for clues about the Ranch's ruin.
Talk to Snow White about the Memory you found.
Search around the Ranch's Ruins near Snow White for clues about what happened.
Return to Snow White.
Search around the Ranch's ruined Stable near Snow White for clues about the Ranch's ruin.
Make sure the Strange Feather is in your Inventory.
Return to Snow White to discuss what you found.
Use the sign beside the Stable to upgrade it and open a new stall.
Talk to Snow White.

quests.name: Tales of a Broken Heart
objectives: Follow Snow White to the Wishblossom Heart's entrance.
Talk to Snow White.

The crystals seem to react to the presence of your Wishblossom Horse.
  ‧ To remove strange red crystals, approach them while riding the Wishblossom Horse.
The way is clear! Enter the Heart of the Wishblossom Mountains.
Explore deeper inside the Wishblossom Heart.

The Giant Wishblossom is weak. Use your horse to remove strange red crystals:
  ‧ At the end of its leftmost root, atop the rock spire.
  ‧ At the end of its rightmost root, inside the cave.
  ‧ At the end of the rearmost root, atop the overlooking ledge.
The Giant Wishblossom seems ready to bloom. Take a closer look.
Talk to Tinker Bell.
Harvest 10 Dead Wishblossoms by galloping through them on your horse.
Return to Tinker Bell in the Heart.
Follow Tinker Bell in the Heart.
Talk to Tinker Bell.
Return to Wishblossom Ranch.
Talk to Snow White.

Brush your horse.
  ‧ (Stand close to it. Caring for your horse each day will help level it up!)

Some Villagers have arrived at the Wishblossom Ranch!
  ‧ Talk to Scrooge McDuck about Snow White's housing situation.
Place Snow White's House near the Ranch.
Use the Scrooge McDuck Sign near Snow White's House to build it.
Welcome Snow White to the Wishblossom Mountains.
Talk to Snow White.

quests.name: Goodness Level Check
objectives: You found a sign with a strange drawing of Donald on it.
Show the Vandalized Sign to Donald.
Talk to Stitch

Gather the following materials to repair the signs:
  ‧ 15 Hardwood
  ‧ 15 Softwood
  ‧ 3 Vandalized Sign near the entrances to the Peaceful Meadow

Give some of the materials to Stitch
  ‧ 5 Hardwood
  ‧ 5 Softwood
  ‧ 1 Vandalized Sign
Craft two Donald Sign at a Crafting Station
Show the repaired signs to Stitch
Place 3  Donald Sign (and Stitch's Donald Sign) in the Peaceful Meadow
Talk to Stitch
Listen to Stitch apologize to Donald
Talk to Stitch

quests.name: Very Sleepy Stitch
objectives: Who made a mess near WALL-E's Garden?
Bring the Coffee Cup you found to WALL-E
Make sure you have the Coffee Cup in your Inventory.
Talk to Stitch
Bring the Dried-Out Coffee Sapling to WALL-E

Gather the materials to plant the Coffee Tree:
  ‧ 25 Pebbles
  ‧ 25 Clay
  ‧ 1 Sack
Talk to WALL-E
Craft the Coffee Sapling at a Crafting Station
Plant the Coffee Sapling in the Glade of Trust and tend to it
Pick some Coffee Bean
Return to Stitch
Talk to Remy about what to do with the 3 Coffee Bean
Brew some Coffee for Stitch at a Cooking Station.
Bring Stitch his Coffee

quests.name: Stitch's Hobby
objectives:
Gather the materials to repair the Broken Television
  ‧ 9 Tinkering Parts
  ‧ 3 Gold Ingot
  ‧ 3 Glass
Repair the Broken Television at a Crafting Station
Meet Stitch in his House
Bring Stitch his television
Give Stitch his television

Dress up for an adventure! Style yourself using:
  ‧ A sporty top
  ‧ Sporty pants
  ‧ Sporty shoes
Tell Stitch you're ready to bring him on an adventure.
Meet Stitch inside the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach.
Talk to Stitch
Follow Stitch to the bottom of the Mystical Cave.
Meet Stitch inside Ursula's House.
Ursula seems annoyed by your intrusion. Talk to her.
Get out of here before Stitch ends up as part of Ursula's garden!
Talk to Stitch
Listen to Ariel and Stitch
Talk to Stitch

quests.name: Making Music
objectives: Find Villagers who play the perfect instruments to accompany Stitch.
Ask Scrooge McDuck for some musical equipment.

Gather the materials for the Photo Backdrop
  ‧ 20 Hardwood
  ‧ 10 Glass
  ‧ 10 Fabric
  ‧ 9 Tinkering Parts
Craft the Photo Backdrop
Make sure the Photo Backdrop is in your Inventory
Bring the Photo Backdrop to Scrooge McDuck
Talk to Stitch
Bring Stitch to the Dream Castle
Go to the third floor of the Castle where Scrooge McDuck has set up the Photo Backdrop
Take 3 pictures of Stitch against the Photo Backdrop
Your photos look great! Now for that sound equipment
Talk to Scrooge McDuck
Wait until tomorrow to talk to Stitch
Talk to Stitch
Talk to Scrooge McDuck
Place the Sound Equipment on Dazzle Beach
Attend the party with the Sound Equipment
Talk to Stitch

quests.name: Monster Movie Night
objectives: Talk to Scrooge McDuck.

Ask these Villagers about a videotape for Monster Movie Night:
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Mickey.
  ‧ Goofy.
Find the Videotape in a deep and dark place at the Beach.
Bring the Videotape to Sulley.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 50 Fiber
  ‧ 20 Softwood
  ‧ 10 Glass
Craft the Big Scream TV.
Make sure you have the Big Scream TV in your Inventory.
Bring the Big Scream TV to Sulley.
Talk to Mike.
(Optional) order the 3 items you need from Scrooge McDuck

Put on your Monster Movie Night outfit:
  ‧ A blue casual top
  ‧ A pair of blue casual pants
  ‧ "Scarer Sulley" Slippers
Return to Sulley.
Place the Big Scream TV where you want in the Valley.
Enjoy Monster Movie Night.
Return to Sulley.

quests.name: Villager of the Month
objectives:
Talk to the Villagers:
  ‧ Mike.
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Donald.

Help each Villager with their projects for the Villager of the Month contest:
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Mike.
  ‧ Donald.
Return to Sulley.
Talk to Mike.
Go see Sulley.
Place the Villager-of-the-Month Award Stand wherever you want in the Valley.
Attend the Villager of the Month ceremony.
Return to Sulley.

quests.name: The Power of Knowledge
objectives:
Gather the materials:
  ‧ 10 Lemons
  ‧ 2 Iron Ingots
Craft the Lemon Clock at a Crafting Station.
Make sure the Lemon Clock is in your Inventory.
Bring the Lemon Clock to Sulley.
Listen to Sulley and Vanellope.
Talk to Sulley.
Go to the Monsters, Inc. Realm.
Find the Frightcade Game.
Make sure the Frightcade Game is in your Inventory.
Bring the Frightcade Game to Sulley.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 6 Gold Ingots
  ‧ 5 Purified Night Shards

Craft the Dreamlight Magic Arcade Game at a Crafting Station.
Make sure the Dreamlight Magic Arcade Game is in your Inventory.
Bring the Dreamlight Magic Arcade Game to Sulley.
Place the Dreamlight Magic Arcade anywhere you like in the Valley.
Power up the Dreamlight Magic Arcade by interacting with it.
Return to Sulley.
Listen to Sulley and Vanellope.
Talk to Sulley.

quests.name: The Scavenger Hunt
objectives:
Invite the contestants Sulley selected:
  ‧ Stitch.
  ‧ Olaf.
  ‧ Vanellope.
  ‧ (Optional) Donald.
Go to Sulley's House to start the scavenger hunt.
Talk to Sulley.
Listen to Sulley giving the instructions for the scavenger hunt.
Go to “a royal hall with many doors.”
Talk to Olaf.
Find the Third Clue “near the wizard made of gold.”
Make sure you have the Third Clue in your Inventory.
Bring the Third Clue to Olaf.
Go “under the cascade” on the Sunlit Plateau.
Talk to Stitch.
Cast your hook into the underground babbling pool to find the Fifth Clue.
Make sure you have the Fifth Clue in your Inventory.
Bring the Fifth Clue to Stitch.
Find the place that completes this riddle: “Hope your veggies aren't stemmy when you visit Chez…”
Talk to Vanellope.
Simmer the Final Clue with sunshine fruit that powers a clock.
Make sure the Decoded Final Clue is in your Inventory.
Bring the Decoded Final Clue to Vanellope.
Make sure the Decoded Final Clue is in your Inventory.
Bring the Decoded Final Clue to Sulley.
Talk to Vanellope.

Gather the materials:
  ‧  25 Purple Flowers
  ‧ 15 Blueberries
  ‧ 2 Boiled Eggs
Bring the materials to Stitch.
Place the Sulley Statue in the Valley.
Attend the unveiling of the Sulley Statue.
Return to Sulley.

quests.name: Escape Claws
objectives: Examine the door to the Laugh Floor.
Search for something to disguise yourself as a monster.

Open the bag of Monstrous Accessories.
  ‧ Put on your Monsters, Inc. Hard Hat once your disguise is complete.
  ‧ Put on your choice of Monstrous Ears.
(Optional) Experiment with Fantasy Skin Tones and Contact Lenses in the Wardrobe Menu to create a Monstrous Disguise.
Take a selfie only once you're happy with your new Monstrous Disguise.
Unlock the door to the Laugh Floor in your Monstrous Disguise.
Talk to Sulley.

Clean the Laugh Floor.
  ‧ 4 Slug Slime Puddles
  ‧ 8 Party Trash
Listen to Mike and Sulley talk.
Talk to Sulley.

Use the coffee station to cook:
  ‧ The Wazowski Special.
  ‧ Sulley's Coffee.
Make sure you have Mike and Sulley's coffees in your Inventory.
Bring the coffees to Mike Wazowski.
Talk to Sulley.
Find the Emergency Manual.
Bring the Emergency Manual to Sulley.

Find and replace the fuses and correct the power flow to rescue Mike.
  ‧ 3 Electrical Panel
  ‧ 10 Power Lines
Talk to Mike Wazowski.

  ‧ 3 Orange clothes.
  ‧ 2 Black clothes.

Talk to Tigger to see what he thinks of your tiggerific outfit.

Gather materials for the Tiggerific Horse Blanket:

  ‧ 1 Red Silk Flower.

Craft the Tiggerific Horse Blanket.
Equip your Wishblossom Horse with the Tiggerific Horse Blanket.
Ride your tiggerific Wishblossom Horse before meeting with Tigger.
Talk to Tigger while riding on your Wishblossom Horse.
(Optional) Create your own obstacle course in Wishblossom Mountains using any fences.
Jump over 20 obstacles along with Tigger.
Return to Tigger.

Prepare a surprise for Tigger!
  ‧ Meet Snow White in her House.
  ‧ Talk to Snow White.

Gather materials to make the Tiggerific Poster Billboard:
  ‧ 10 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
  ‧ 3 Antique Clothes Iron.
  ‧ 1 Black Silk Flower.
  ‧ 1 Red Silk Flower.
  ‧ 1 Yellow Lily of the Valley.
Craft the Tiggerific Poster Billboard to commemorate this day.
Place down the Tiggerific Poster Billboard in Wishblossom Mountains.
Take a picture to capture the tiggerific moment!
Return to Tigger.

quests.name: Bounce Up, Never Down
objectives: Talk to Snow White to let her know about Khan.

Reach Friendship Level 4 with Khan to clear the way to Pixie Acres.
  ‧ Gain XP with your horses by riding them, jumping obstacles, and doing activities. Pet, brush, and feed them each day for big XP boosts!
Talk to Snow White about your friendship with Khan.
Search the eastern edge of Modish Marsh to find a steel barrier blocking the way to Pixie Acres. Use Khan to kick it down when you're ready to keep exploring!
Break the steel barrier with Khan to enter Pixie Acres.
Enter Pixie Acres and explore Sundae Shores to find a new friend.
Find Tigger in the Hundred-Acre Fields. (Turn left at the waterfalls, then go through the giant hollow log.)
Talk to Tigger up in the Ginormous Flowering Tree.
Talk a picture of the word HELP for Tinker Bell.

Explore Pixie Acres to gather potion Ingredients for Tinker Bell:
  ‧ Pick 2 Yellow Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ Pick 2 Blue Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ Pick 2 Pink Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ Gather 2 Bonsai Star Fruit.
Bring the potion Ingredients to Tinker Bell.
Use your Pickaxe to break each HELP near the Ginormous Flowering Tree in Pixie Acresand collect the three letter Hs
Interact with the Ginormous Flowering Tree to build a ladder out of letter Hs.
Tigger isn't giving you any more words to build with. Talk to Snow White for ideas to make Tigger talk.
Cook Honey Pancakes for Tigger.
Make sure you have Honey Pancakes in your Inventory for Tigger.
Bring Honey Pancakes to Tigger up the the Ginormous Flowering Tree.
Use your Pickaxe to break each HONEY in the lower Hundred-Acre Fields (past the hollow log) and gather the letter Hs
Interact with the Ginormous Flowering Tree to complete the letter ladder.
Talk to Tigger to make sure he's okay.

quests.name: The BallOOn Family
objectives: Tigger seems to have new plans. Talk to him.
Follow Tigger to the Sundae Shores beach to find the red balloon.
Ask Tigger about the balloon and the rock.
Break the red balloon free from the rock trapping it.
Red BallOOn is on the run. Catch him!
Chase Red BallOOn and catch him.
Make sure you have Red BallOOn in your Inventory.
Bring Red BallOOn to Tigger.
Find Sister BallOOn. (She was last seen past the waterfalls and butterflies in the Hundred-Acre Fields. Don't let any decoys fool you!)
Find Mama BallOOn. (She was last seen uphill from the beach in Sundae Shores. Don't be fooled by imitations!)

Make sure Mama and Sister BallOOn are safe, then bring them to Tigger.
  ‧ Make sure you have Sister BallOOn in your Inventory.
  ‧ Make sure you have Mama BallOOn in your Inventory.
Bring Mama and Sister BallOOn to Tigger.
Papa BallOOn is still missing! Follow Tigger to find him.
Talk to Tigger.
Fish Papa BallOOn out of the pond near the waterfalls.
Make sure you have Papa BallOOn in your Inventory.
Bring Deflated Papa BallOOn to Tigger.

Papa BallOOn needs helium, stat! Gather resources to fix the Broken Helium Tank:

Repair the Broken Helium Tank.
Make sure the Helium Tank is in your Inventory.
Bring the Helium Tank to Tigger.
Place the BallOOn Family BOuquet anywhere in the Wishblossom Mountains.

Bring Tigger the Pickaxe Potion Ingredients.

Exchange your tickets at the prize stand.

Use your Pickaxe to hit the mark on the Strength-Testing Flower.
Claim your tickets at the prize stand.

objectives: Go visit the lily pad pond.

Claim your tickets at the prize stand.

quests.name: Solve the Puzzle
objectives: Find the Matching Puzzle.

Gather resources to repair the Broken Tile:

  ‧ Dig for 10 Clay.
Craft the Repaired Tile.
Make sure the Repaired Tile is in your Inventory.
Place the Repaired Tile in the Matching Puzzle.
Solve the Matching Puzzle.
Claim your tickets at the prize stand.

quests.name: Old Enemies
objectives:
Turn Pride Rock into a jungle oasis.
  ‧ 10 Base.
  ‧ 3 Wide Jungle Plant.
  ‧ 3 Short Jungle Plant.
  ‧ 3 Small Palm Tree.
Talk to Timon.
Give Timon 15 minutes to settle into Dreamlight Valley.
Check in on Timon and see how he is doing.

  ‧ Talk to Vanellope.
  ‧ Find a way to remove the trap using your Royal Tools.
Return to Timon.
Talk to Pumbaa.

Gather the materials for the Board Game:

  ‧ 3 Glass.
  ‧ 1 Gold Ingot.

  ‧ 3 Milk.
  ‧ 3 Slush Ice.

Prepare for some relaxing fun with Timon and Pumbaa.
  ‧ 3 Make some Dream Ice Cream.
  ‧ 1 Craft a Board Game.

Make sure you have:
  ‧ 2 Dream Ice Cream.
  ‧ 1 Board Game.
Bring the Dream Ice Cream and the Board Game to Timon.
Place the Board Game anywhere in the Village.
Take a picture with Timon and Pumbaa in front of your Board Game.

quests.name: Curious About Critters
objectives:
Ask Buzz and Scrooge if they have a Recording Device.
  ‧ Talk to Buzz.
  ‧ Talk to Scrooge.

Gather components by fishing in the Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Rusted Recorder
  ‧ Soaked Batteries
  ‧ Electronic Parts
Assemble the Recording Device at a Crafting Station.
Make sure you have the Recording Device in your Inventory.
Bring the Recording Device to Timon.

Take pictures of some wild critters in the Valley for Timon's documentary:
  ‧ An urban creature.
  ‧ A colorful reptile.
  ‧ A furry omnivore.
  ‧ A dark-colored critter.
  ‧ A talking dragon.
Talk to Timon.

Take pictures inside the homes of the fiercest neighbors in the Valley:
  ‧ Pride Rock.
  ‧ Scar's Cave.
  ‧ Beast's Castle.
  ‧ The Cursed Cave on Dazzle Beach.
Return to Ursula's Beach Cave.

Are Scar and Ursula plotting something?
  ‧ Listen to Scar and Ursula's conversation.
Exit the Cave.

Scar, Ursula, and Mother Gothel are up to something...
  ‧ Talk to Timon.

Scar, Ursula, and Mother Gothel are scheming... Search for clues in:
  ‧ The Giant Willow Tree.
  ‧ Scar's Cave.
  ‧ Ursula's House.
  ‧ Show the diary entries to Timon.
Enter the Vitalys Mines.

Scar and Mother Gothel are having a secret meeting in the Mines!
  ‧ Take a picture of Scar and Mother Gothel together.
  ‧ Listen to Scar and Mother Gothel's conversation.
Talk to the Forgotten about what you've found out.
Return to Timon.
Collect 1000 Star Coins for a Giant Projector.

Take a picture of everyone reunited around the Giant Projector.
Listen to Timon talk to Scar.
Talk to Timon.

quests.name: The Timon Talk
objectives: Take a picture of Timon

Gather the materials to make Timon's Billboards:

  ‧ 4 Gold Ingot.
  ‧ 24 Glass.
Craft 4 Timon Billboard at a Crafting Station.

Place the Timon Billboard in:

Talk to Simba.
Meet Timon at Pride Rock.
Talk to Timon.
Return to Pride Rock for the Timon Talk.
Listen to Timon as he gives his talk.
Talk to Timon.

Gather Ingredients:

Bring the Fireflies to Moana.

Make sure you have the Night Mite Wings in your Inventory.

Remove the Night Mite Nest from the Plaza.

Clear the Dark Castle's Mite infestation:

Talk to Pumbaa upstairs in the Dark Castle.
Collect and activate the Dark Pickaxe Upgrade from the chest in the Dark Castle.
Reach the Night Mite Queen's Nest by breaking the strange rocks in the Dark Castle.
Catch the remaining 3 Night Mites.
Catch the Night Mite Queen.
Remove the Night Mite Queen's Nest.

The Dark Castle is cleared of Night Mites!

Return to Dreamlight Valley through the portal.
Complete "The Infestation Finale" with Merlin.
Talk to Timon

quests.name: Drawings?
objectives: Photograph 7 Simba drawings in The Lion King Realm

quests.name: Where's Pumbaa?
objectives: Where is Pumbaa? Check with Timon.
Search the jungle in The Lion King Realm for Pumbaa.
Check to see how Pumbaa is doing in the log.
Talk to Timon.
Take a photo for a closer look at how to free Pumbaa.
Talk to Timon.

  ‧ 1 Blue Oily Bugs.
  ‧ 1 Red Oily Bugs.

Give Timon the Super Slippery Bug Oil.
Use your Watering Can to pour oil on Pumbaa.
Talk to Pumbaa and see if he can free himself.

Check with Goofy for a solution to free Pumbaa from the log.

Gather material to reinforce the plunger:

  ‧ 5 Tourmaline.
-15 Hardwood.
Craft the Reinforced Plunger.

Make sure you have the Reinforced Plunger in your Inventory.
Check in with Pumbaa in the log.
Check Pumbaa's state.
Follow Timon and Pumbaa back top the camp.
Listen to Timon and Pumbaa.
Talk to Timon.
Return to Dreamlight Valley.

Talk with Pumbaa.

Talk to Timon.

quests.name: Home Is Where the Heart Is
objectives: Talk to Snow White.
Talk to Merlin.

Gather the materials needed to craft the Pixie Furniture Set:
  ‧ 10 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
  ‧ 3 Pincushion Peach.
  ‧ 5 Giant Acorns.
  ‧ 5 Copter Seeds.

Craft the Pixie Furniture Set:
  ‧ 2 Floral Fairy Bench.
  ‧ 1 Floral Fairy Table.

Place the Pixie Furniture Set near Snow White's House:
  ‧ 2 Floral Fairy Bench.
  ‧ 1 Floral Fairy Table.
Wait for Merlin and meet up with him near Snow White's House.
Talk to Merlin.
Make sure you have the Tiny Pixie Furniture Set in your Inventory.
Bring the Tiny Pixie Furniture Set to Snow White.
Talk to Tinker Bell about party preparation progress.

Tigger never brought the games for the party...
  ‧ Talk to him.

Locate and dig out the party games in Pixie Flats and Sundae Shores:
  ‧ Bowling Set.
  ‧ Board Game.

You found the games. The party for Snow White can start!
  ‧ Enter the Wishblossom Heart to start the festivities.
Bring the Bowling Set and Board Game to Tinker Bell in the Heart.
take a picture of Tinker Bell in the Heart.
Talk to Tinker Bell.

Decor Pixie Acres with:

  ‧ (Optional) Cute and Rustic furniture to make a space for Tinker Bell's House
Welcome Tinker Bell to the Valley!
Talk to Tinker Bell.

quests.name: Uneasy Neighbors
objectives: Follow Tinker Bell to the terrarium in Pixie Acres.

  ‧ 15 Grassy Ore.

  ‧ 10 Balloon Fish.
  ‧ 5 Honeycomb Stone.

Use the Scrooge McDuck Sign near the Pixie Village Terrarium and complete all the Blueprint steps:
  ‧ Complete the first Blueprint step.
Talk to Tinker Bell.
Follow Tinker Bell to the "waterfall" in Pixie Acres.
Talk to Tinker Bell near the Honey Waterfall in Pixie Acres.
Fish some Honey Coral from the waterfall.
Give Tinker Bell the Honey Coral.
Talk to Tigger.
Cook three different meals using Coral Honey.
(Optional) Talk to Remy for recipe ideas.
Make sure the 3 Coral Honey-based meals are in your Inventory.
Bring the Coral Honey-based meals to Tigger.
Listed to Tigger's apology to Tinker Bell.
Talk to Tinker Bell.

quests.name: Tink's Trinkets
objectives:
Check your mailbox for a message from Tigger.
  ‧ (Make sure you collect all items in the message!)
Make sure the Trinket Box is in your Inventory.
Bring the Trinket Box to Tinker Bell.

Gather the materials needed to repair the trinkets:
  ‧ 2 Jasper.
  ‧ 5 Rusty Hinge.
  ‧ 5 Red Currants.
  ‧ 5 Antique Clothes Iron.
  ‧ 4 Fairy Kamut.
  ‧ 4 Fairy Sprinkles.

Repair Tink's trinkets at a Crafting Station:

Make sure you have Star Command Laser Toy in your Inventory.
Find the rightful owner of the Star Command Laser Toy.
Make sure you have Carrot Peeler in your Inventory.
Find the rightful owner of the Carrot Peeler.
Make sure you have Golden Fabric Scissors in your Inventory.
Find the rightful owner of the Golden Fabric Scissors.
Talk to Tinker Bell

quests.name: Time to Fly
objectives: Talk to Peter Pan.
Meet Tinker Bell and Peter Pan in the Wishblossom Heart.

Peter Pan and Tinker Bell are reunited!
  ‧ Talk to Peter Pan.
Something fishy is going on...Spy on Peter Pan and Tinker Bell.
Catch enough fish to learn how to fly? (10K)

Peter and Tink are being suspicious...
  ‧ Talk to Tinker Bell.

Revisit areas in the Wishblossom Mountains to collect Happy Thoughts crystals:
  ‧ The place where you first met your Wishblossom Horse.
  ‧ The beach where you had some fun with BallOOns.
  ‧ The place where you confronted Cruella with skunks.
Make sure the Dreamy Happy Thought is in your Inventory
Make sure the Ambitious Happy Thought is in your Inventory
Make sure the Hopeful Happy Thought is in your Inventory.
Bring the Happy Thoughts to Tinker Bell.

Equip the pixie accessories on your Wishblossom Horse.

Your Wishblossom Horse has wings! Time to try them out.

Talk to Tinker Bell.

quests.name: Crystal Cavern: Wishing Alps
objectives:
You found the Wishing Alps' Crystal Key!
  ‧ Bring it to Tinker Bell in the Wishblossom Heart only where you're ready to delver deeper in the Caverns.
Follow Tinker Bell to the first Crystal Cavern.
Enter the first Crystal Cavern in the Wishblossom Heart.

You made it to the first Crystal Cavern! This door is blocking your way.
  ‧ Use the weight of your horse and large objects to activate the pressure plates on the ground.

It worked! The door is open and the way is clear.
  ‧ Explore deeper inside the Crystal Cavern.

An elevator? Where could it lead?
  ‧ Use the lever on the elevator to activate it.
Continue exploring the Crystal Cavern.

You found the Wishblossom of Hope.
  ‧ ... Talk to it?

The Wishblossom of Hope is weak. Recover its strength by removing crystals on its roots, located:
  ‧ In the blue area by its right root.
  ‧ In the green area behind it.
  ‧ In the pink area to its left.

The Decay crystals have been removed and Pixie Dust is flowing again to the Wishblossom of Hope!
  ‧ Talk to it.

You found Maximus!
  ‧ Approach him and go for a ride.
Maximus can cross large gaps with his Leap ability.

While riding Maximus, hold shift and gallop towards a chasm to jump over it!
  ‧ Reach the crystal archway behind the Wishblossom of Hope by jumping over the water with Maximus.
Exit the Crystal Cavern and return to the Wishblossom Heart.

quests.name: Crystal Caverns: Glamour Gulch
objectives:
You found Glamour Gulch's Crystal Key.
  ‧ Bring it to Tinker Bell in the Wishblossom Heart only when you're ready to delve deeper in the caves.
Talk to Tinker Bell.
Go inside the Crystal Cavern for Glamour Gulch.

Progress further into the second Crystal Cavern.
  ‧ A proud horse might help jump any large gaps...

Mount Maximus - you've got some tracking to do!
  ‧ Interact with the lever base to pick up the scent trail of the missing lever handle.
Follow the scent trail to find the handle for the lever in the second Crystal Cavern.
Pick up the handle for the lever in the second Crystal Cavern.
Put the handle back on the socket.

You can now use the lowered elevator as a platform for Maximus to jump on!
  ‧ Progress further in the second Crystal Cavern.

Remove the Decay crystals affecting the Wishblossom:
  ‧ In the blue area, on top of the mezzanine near the entrance.
  ‧ In the green flooded area to its right.
  ‧ In the pink area, behind the cluttered elevator to its left.

The Decay crystals are dealt with!
  ‧ Talk to the Wishblossom of Ambition.
Approach Khan and mount it.

A sturdy wooden barricade behind the Giant Wishblossom is blocking the way out of the Crystal Cavern!
  ‧ Interact with the barrier while mounted on Khan to have him use his powerful hooves to break free.

There's a shortcut back to the Wishblossom Heart by using Khan to break the barricades!
  ‧ Return to the Wishblossom Heart.

quests.name: Crystal Cavern: Pixie Acres
objectives:
You found the Crystal Key in Pixie Acres!
  ‧ Bring the Crystal Key to Tinker Bell in the Wishblossom Heart when you're ready to delve deeper.
Talk to Tinker Bell.
Enter the third Crystal Cavern in the Wishblossom Heart.
Break the barricade with Khan.
The door is blocking your way. Find a way to open it.
The way is clear! Explore deeper inside the Crystal Cavern.
Talk to the Wishblossom in the third Crystal Cavern.

Remove the Decay crystals to allow the Wishblossom to bloom.
  ‧ Use Khan in the green area to break the barricade and take the elevator.
  ‧ Use Maximus in the blue area to find the elevator's lever.
  ‧ Use your Wishblossom Horse in the pink area to push the block onto the pressure plate.
Talk to the Wishblossom in the third Crystal Cavern.

Ready to fly out of here?
  ‧ Ride Pegasus and gallop towards the wind tunnel behind the Giant Wishblossom.
Talk to Snow White.

Break the Decay crystals around the Wishblossom Mountains:
  ‧ 18 In the Wishing Alps.
  ‧ 18 In Glamour Gulch.
  ‧ 18 In Pixie Acres.
The Decay won't be stopped. Talk to Tinker Bell in the Wishblossom Heart.

quests.name: The Decay
objectives: Talk to Tinker Bell.

Reach Friendship Level 5 with Pegasus to be able to fly to the heart of the maelstrom.
  ‧ Gain XP with your horses by riding them, jumping obstacles, and doing activities. Pet, brush, and feed them each day for big XP boosts!
Talk to Snow White.
Talk to Cruella.
Talk to Tigger.

Put on the Hope Necklace, Ambition Bracelet, and Dream Earrings.
  ‧ Hope Necklace.
  ‧ Ambition Bracelet.
  ‧ Dream Earrings.
Talk to the Giant Wishblossom in the Heart.
Enter the maelstrom in the Wishblossom Heart through the wind tunnel with Pegasus.
Break all 3 Decay crystals at the entrance to the Island.
Use the activated wind tunnel to visit the first Crystal Island.
Talk to Hope Wishblossom.
Break all 5 Decay crystals on the first Crystal Island.
Use the activated wind tunnel to visit the second Crystal Island.
Talk to Ambition Wishblossom.
Break all 5 Decay crystals on the second Crystal Island.
Use the activated wind tunnel to visit the third Crystal Island.
Talk to Dream Wishblossom.
Break all 5 Decay crystals on the third Crystal Island.
Reach the last wind tunnel.

spoilers.title: Crystal Glade of Trust
spoilers.objective: Beside the door to Mother Gothel's tree house, on the ground to the right near a large root.

spoilers.title: Crystal Frosted Heights
spoilers.objective: On the east bank of the northern-most point in the river on the ground.

spoilers.title: Crystal Sunlit Plateau
spoilers.objective: The east side of the watering hole on the ground next to the water.

quests.name: Villager of the Month: Ursula

A series of codes were given to streamers, each with a different text based on the streamer name. These codes share one redemption - after collecting items from one code the others will no longer redeem.

The code was shared hidden inside a screenshot shared in the official discord game news channel by the developers on October 24, 2022. The code is very faintly written on the top of the bench in the image - and is quite easy to miss.
The developers gave a hint to the discord server moderators about the code and they managed to find and solve it. It wasn't discovered/shared by the rest of players in the discord until November 24, 2022 - a month after the image had been shared.
