universes.description: A Bug's Life is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the animated film A Bug's Life (1998).
universes.name: A Bug's Life

universes.description: Aladdin is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Aladdin (1992), which is based on the 1001 Nights fairytales.
universes.name: Aladdin

universes.description: Alice in Wonderland is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Alice in Wonderland (1951), which is based on the novel Alice's Adventures in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll.
universes.name: Alice in Wonderland

universes.description: Ancient Civilization is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley which is applied to a number of pieces of crafted furniture.
universes.name: Ancient Civilization

universes.description: Atlantis is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Atlantis: The Lost Empire (2001).
universes.name: Atlantis

universes.description: Beauty and the Beast is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Beauty and the Beast (1991).
universes.name: Beauty and the Beast

universes.description: Big Hero 6 is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Big Hero 6 (2014) and its franchise.
universes.name: Big Hero 6

universes.description:
Brave is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Brave (2012).
The film features Princess Merida, who is determined to make her own path in life, and defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
universes.name: Brave

universes.description: Cars is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Cars (2006) and its sequels Cars 2 (2011) and Cars 3 (2017).
universes.name: Cars

universes.description: Cinderella is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Cinderella (1950), which is based on the fairy tale by Charles Perrault.
universes.name: Cinderella

universes.description: Coco is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Coco (2017).
universes.name: Coco

universes.description: Disney Fairies is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based around the character Tinker Bell of the Disney animated film Peter Pan (1953).
universes.name: Disney Fairies

universes.description: Disney is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the the real life Disney Parks or otherwise generally related to Disney.
universes.name: Disney

universes.description: Dreamlight Valley is the universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley which is based on the world where the game takes place.
universes.name: Dreamlight Valley

universes.description: Elemental is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Elemental (2023).
universes.name: Elemental

universes.description: Encanto is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Encanto (2021).
universes.name: Encanto

universes.description: Enchanted is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the live-action film Enchanted (2007) and its sequel Disenchanted (2022).
universes.name: Enchanted

universes.description: Fantasia is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Fantasia (1940).
universes.name: Fantasia

universes.description: Finding Nemo is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Finding Nemo (2003) and its sequel Finding Dory (2016).
universes.name: Finding Nemo

universes.description: Frozen is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Frozen (2013) and the sequel films Frozen II (2019) and the upcoming Frozen III (2027). It is loosely based on Hans Christian Anderson's fairytale The Snow Queen.
universes.name: Frozen

universes.description: Hercules is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Hercules (1997).
universes.name: Hercules

universes.description: Hocus Pocus is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney live action film Hocus Pocus (1993) and its sequel Hocus Pocus 2 (2022).
universes.name: Hocus Pocus

universes.description: Inside Out is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar franchise Inside Out, which includes the original 2015 film of the same name and its 2024 sequel, Inside Out 2.
universes.name: Inside Out

universes.description: Lady and the Tramp is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Lady and the Tramp (1955).
universes.name: Lady and the Tramp

universes.description: Lightyear is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Lightyear (2022).
universes.name: Lightyear

universes.description: Lilo & Stitch is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Lilo & Stitch (2002).
universes.name: Lilo & Stitch

universes.description:
Maleficent is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney live action film Maleficent (2014).
The film is a retelling of the Disney animated film Sleeping Beauty (1959), but tells the story from the perspective of the evil fairy Maleficent.
universes.name: Maleficent

universes.description: Mickey & Friends is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on Disney's classic characters from Mickey Mouse animated shorts and comics.
universes.name: Mickey & Friends

universes.description:
Moana is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Moana (2016).
The film is set in ancient Polynesia, where a terrible curse incurred by the demigod Maui reaches Moana's island and she answers the ocean's call to seek out the demigod to set things right.
universes.name: Moana

universes.description:
Monsters, Inc. is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Monsters, Inc. (2001) and the prequel film Monsters University (2013).
In the original film, to power their city monsters have to harnesses the screams of human children for energy. Children are believed to be toxic to the monsters, but after a child gets through to their world monsters Mike and Sulley realize things may not be what they think.
universes.name: Monsters, Inc.

universes.description:
Mulan is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Mulan (1998).
The film tells the story of Fa Mulan, who impersonates a man to take her father's place in a mandatory military enlistment to counter a Hun invasion during an unspecified Imperial dynasty of China.
universes.name: Mulan

universes.description: One Hundred and One Dalmatians is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film One Hundred and One Dalmatians (1961).
universes.name: One Hundred and One Dalmatians

universes.description:
Oswald the Lucky Rabbit is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated short films starring the character Oswald the Lucky Rabbit.
Oswald the Lucky Rabbit is a character from the Disney franchise, known for his mischievous personality and adventures. He is often seen as a precursor to Mickey Mouse.
universes.name: Oswald the Lucky Rabbit

universes.description:
Peter Pan is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Peter Pan (1953).
The film tells the story of the adventurous Peter Pan who whisks Wendy, John, and Michael Darling away to the faraway world of Neverland, where they encounter mermaids, pirates, and the villainous Captain Hook.
universes.name: Peter Pan

universes.description:
Pirates of the Caribbean is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, which originated with the Disneyland theme park ride of the same name that opened in 1967.
The theme park ride has been adapted into films and books that primarily follow the adventures of pirate Captain Jack Sparrow, including the Pirates of the Caribbean film series.
universes.name: Pirates of the Caribbean

universes.description:
Pocahontas is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Pocahontas (1995).
The film romanticizes Pocahontas' encounter with John Smith and her legendary saving of his life.
universes.name: Pocahontas

universes.description:
Ratatouille is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Ratatouille (2007).
The film stars Remy, a rat with a passion for cooking, and follows his journey to become a chef in Paris.
universes.name: Ratatouille

universes.description:
Raya And The Last Dragon is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Raya and the Last Dragon (2021).
The film features a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, where a warrior named Raya is determined to find Sisu, the last dragon.
universes.name: Raya And The Last Dragon

universes.description: Robin Hood is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Robin Hood (1973).
universes.name: Robin Hood

universes.description:
Sleeping Beauty is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Sleeping Beauty (1959), which is based on the fairy tale by Charles Perrault.
The film stars princess Aurora, who is cursed by Maleficent to die from a prick with the spindle of a spinning wheel, but is saved by the three good fairies, who alter the curse so that she instead fall into a deep sleep to be awakened by true love's kiss.
universes.name: Sleeping Beauty

universes.description: Sleepy Hollow is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad (1949).
universes.name: Sleepy Hollow

universes.description:
Snow White is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937).
The film stars Snow White, whom an Evil Queen attempts to have her murdered in jealousy of her beauty. She escapes and is given shelter by seven Dwarfs in their cottage in the forest.
universes.name: Snow White

universes.description:
Star Wars is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the film franchise Star Wars.
The films tell the story of a long galactic war between the heroic Jedi and the tyrannical Sith.
universes.name: Star Wars

universes.description:
Tangled is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Tangled (2010), which is based on the fairy tale Rapunzel by the Brothers Grimm.
The film stars Rapunzel, a lost young princess with magical long blonde hair who was stolen from her parents by the vain Mother Gothel and yearns to leave her secluded tower. She accepts the aid of thief Flynn Rider to take her out into the world which she has never seen.
universes.name: Tangled

universes.description: The Black Cauldron is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Black Cauldron (1985).
universes.name: The Black Cauldron

universes.description:
The Emperor's New Groove is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Emperor's New Groove (2000).
In the film, young, self-centered emperor Kuzco is accidentally transformed into a llama by his ex-advisor Yzma and her henchman Kronk. To become human again, he must rely on Pacha, a village leader to help him return to the palace.
universes.name: The Emperor's New Groove

universes.description:
The Incredibles is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film The Incredibles (2004), and its sequel film Incredibles 2 (2018).
The films feature a family of undercover superheroes trying to lead a quiet suburban life who are forced into action to save the world.
universes.name: The Incredibles

universes.description:
The Lion King is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Lion King (1994).
The film features lion prince Simba, who is targeted by his bitter uncle, Scar, who wants to ascend the throne himself. When Scar falsely accuses Simba of killing his father Mufasa, Simba flees the Pride Lands and meets Timon and Pumbaa. After reuniting with childhood friend Nala and meeting the wise Rafiki, Simba returns to the Pride Lands and confronts Scar.
universes.name: The Lion King

universes.description:
The Little Mermaid is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Little Mermaid (1989).
It stars Ariel, a mermaid who longs to walk on land. She strikes a deal with Ursula to become human in order to win the love of Prince Eric.
universes.name: The Little Mermaid

universes.description:
The Princess and the Frog is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Princess and the Frog (2009).
The film stars Tiana, a waitress desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.
universes.name: The Princess and the Frog

universes.description:
The Sword in the Stone is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film The Sword in the Stone (1963).
The film is a retelling of the story of King Arthur, featuring a young Arthur as he is taught the art of kingship with the help of the wizard Merlin and his owl Archimedes.
The film was the last animated Disney film released during Walt Disney's lifetime.
universes.name: The Sword in the Stone

universes.description:
Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the stop-motion film The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993).
The film tells the story of Jack Skellington, the Pumpkin King of Halloween Town, who stumbles upon Christmas Town and schemes to take over the holiday. After his takeover ends in disaster, Jack rescues Santa Claus from the villainous Oogie Boogie.
universes.name: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas

universes.description:
Toy Story is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Toy Story franchise, which includes the Pixar animated films Toy Story (1995), Toy Story 2 (1999), Toy Story 3 (2010), Toy Story 4 (2019), and the upcoming Toy Story 5 (2026).
The films involve the adventures of a group of toys, specifically that of a cowboy sheriff toy named Woody and a space ranger toy named Buzz Lightyear, who come to life when they are not in the sight of humans.
universes.name: Toy Story

universes.description:
Tron is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney film Tron (1982).
The film is about Kevin Flynn, a computer programmer and video game developer who is transported inside the software world of a mainframe computer where he interacts with programs in his attempt to escape.
universes.name: Tron

universes.description:
Turning Red is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Turning Red (2022).
The film stars a thirteen-year-old girl named Mei Lee, who is torn between staying her mother's dutiful daughter and the changes of adolescence. If those challenges were not enough, whenever she gets overly excited she transforms into a giant red panda.
universes.name: Turning Red

universes.description:
Up is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Pixar animated film Up (2009).
The film stars 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen, who travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway, a Wilderness Explorer boy named Russell. Along their journey, they encounter a giant bird that Russell names Kevin and a "talking", friendly dog named Dug.
universes.name: Up

universes.description: WALL-E is a character from the Disney-Pixar film WALL-E (2008). He is unlocked after opening the WALL-E Realm and completing the quest The Shy Little Robot.
universes.name: WALL-E

universes.description: Winnie the Pooh (Universe) is a Universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the animated Winnie the Pooh shorts and films, which in turn, are based on the books by A.A. Milne.
universes.name: Winnie the Pooh

universes.description:
Wreck-It Ralph is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Wreck-It Ralph (2012) and its sequel Ralph Breaks the Internet (2018).
The films star Ralph, the eponymous arcade game villain who rebels against his "bad-guy" role and dreams of becoming a hero. After obtaining a medal from Hero's Duty, he ends up in the racing game Sugar Rush and meets Vanellope, and they become best friends.
universes.name: Wreck-It Ralph

universes.description:
Zootopia is a universe in Disney Dreamlight Valley based on the Disney animated film Zootopia (2016).
The film follows rookie police officer rabbit Judy Hopps teaming up with con artist fox Nick Wilde to uncover a conspiracy involving the disappearance of predators.
universes.name: Zootopia
